data.comment: The match has started.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 4, Corner awarded to New York.
Free kick for DC United in their own half.
Ball safe as New York is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 8, DC United needs to be cautious. New York have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for DC United in their own half.
New York awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 10, Throw-in for DC United in the half of New York.
New York have a goal kick.
New York to take a throw-in in DC United territory.
In the minute 24, DC United are coming forward and Gelmin Rivas gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
DC United takes a corner from the right.
Can DC United capitalize from this throw-in deep inside New York's half?
In the minute 27, New York awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can New York get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in DC United's half?
New York to take a throw-in in DC United territory.
In the minute 28, In Washington, D.C. A free kick has been awarded the away team.
Aaron Long scores with a header and the away team now lead 0-1.
Great play from Kaku to set up the goal.
In the minute 31, DC United awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in DC United.
Ola Kamara of DC United smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 33, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for DC United in their own half.
Throw-in for New York in the half of DC United.
In the minute 37, DC United pushes forward through Julian Gressel, whose finish on goal is saved.
DC United takes a corner from the right.
DC United drives forward and Gelmin Rivas gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 39, Free kick New York.
New York's Mathias Jorgensen is on target but unsuccessful.
Free kick for DC United in the half of New York.
In the minute 42, Aaron Long (New York) has received a first yellow card.
Can DC United get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in New York's half?
Free kick for DC United in their own half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for DC United in the half of New York.
New York awarded a free kick in their own half.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 46, The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Free kick New York.
Corner awarded to DC United.
In the minute 49, In Washington, D.C. A free kick has been awarded the home team.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
The away team replace Dru Yearwood with Florian Valot.
In the minute 55, Throw-in for New York at Audi Field.
DC United have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick for DC United in the half of New York.
In the minute 60, Throw-in high up the field for New York in Washington, D.C..
Goal! Daniel Royer extends New York's lead to 0-2.
That's a fine assist from Jason Pendant.
In the minute 61, Oniel Fisher is on a sub for Chris Odoi-Atsem for DC United.
DC United make their second substitution with Erik Sorga replacing Gelmin Rivas.
Brian White is replacing Mathias Jorgensen for the away team.
In the minute 62, New York make their third substitution with David Jensen replacing Ryan Meara.
Can DC United get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in New York's half?
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 63, Throw-in for DC United close to the penalty box.
Throw-in high up the field for DC United in Washington, D.C..
Throw-in for DC United in the half of New York.
In the minute 64, Throw-in for New York in their own half.
Cristian Casseres Jr (New York) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Ball safe as DC United is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for New York at Audi Field.
DC United awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 67, Federico Higuain is on a sub for Joseph Mora for DC United.
In the minute 69, Throw-in New York.
New York's Daniel Royer misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a DC United goal kick.
In the minute 71, DC United's Federico Higuain is on target but unsuccessful.
DC United to take a throw-in in New York territory.
Ball safe as New York is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 75, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
The home team replace Ola Kamara with Ulises Segura.
Yamil Asad is replacing Julian Gressel for the home team.
In the minute 76, DC United needs to be cautious. New York have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in DC United.
Throw-in for DC United in their own half.
In the minute 77, New York make their fourth substitution with Ben Mines replacing Daniel Royer.
Jared Stroud is replacing Kaku for the away team.
DC United awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 80, DC United have a dangerous throw-in.
DC United to take a throw-in in New York territory.
New York awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 83, New York takes a corner from the right.
Free kick for New York in their own half.
Corner awarded to New York.
In the minute 89, Jason Pendant of New York gets in a strike, but is off target.
Corner awarded to New York.
Goal kick for DC United at Audi Field.
DC United are pushing forward but Erik Sorga's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a New York goal kick.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for New York at Audi Field.
New York drives forward and Florian Valot gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in for New York close to the penalty box.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Washington, D.C..
Can New York get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in DC United's half?
The match is over. Final score 0-2.
